name: Arbust's Revenge
description:
Do you have what it takes to destroy the evil Arbust and his fellow wizards?

To defeat them you must venture into an arena to fight his minions while playing a card game with him at the same time.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • SideStep - QE
  • Shoot - Space / Left Ctrl
  • Click on cards to play them
  • Right click on cards to discard

Tips:

You must play a weapon before you can attack

Use lighting to attack the evil wizard directly.

Win the game by destroying all 3 wizards.

You can mouse over a card to see what ti does.
